title: Sarusawa Pond
marks:
Signature, Title, Mark, and Inscription

L margi LRC: [ よし田 ] {Yoshida}; LRC, in pencil: [Hiroshi Y
description: pond with temple and grounds; silhouette of a 5 storied pagoda; silhouettes of trees in background; branches from willow in foreground
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
